en.title: ENTRETIEN DOMESTIQUE MONTREAL
en.description: Entretien Domestique Montreal is a maintenance service company owned and operated by individuals with professional knowledge and skills. With over 10 years of combined experience, we are proud to be able to offer a range of services executed to a high standard.

items.question: ARE QUOTES FREE?
items.answer: Yes, 100% free and they come with no obligation to book a service.

items.question: ARE THERE ANY OTHER SERVICES EDM PROVIDES?
items.answer: We very regularly perform miscellaneous tasks and attend to hard to reach spaces. Elevated light bulb replacement, crawl spaces, roof debris clearance, overhanging branches for example. Please by all means just ask.

items.question: WHAT AREAS DO YOU COVER?
items.answer: Montreal and a radius including Saint Lazare, Laval, North/South Shore, Vaudreuil-Dorion. We are prepared to travel further at a quoted rate.

items.question: WHAT PAYMENT METHODS DO YOU ACCEPT?
items.answer: We are able to process payments by major credit card and e-transfer.

items.question: DO YOU HAVE INSURANCE?
items.answer: Both your home and all of our staff are insured during our time on your property. All EDM associated personnel are professionally trained.

items.answer: Oui, 100% gratuits et sans obligation de r√©server un service.

window-cleaning.title: Traditional & Water-Fed Window Cleaning
window-cleaning.subtitle: Professional Window Cleaning
window-cleaning.description: Professional window cleaning services for residental and commercial properties in Montreal. Our fully insured and experienced team delivers excellent results using well practiced techniques and high quality equipment.

services.title: Interior Cleaning
services.description: Having both inside and outside of your windows cleaned makes a huge difference to your home's natural lighting and air quality.The opening mechanism will rust and deteriorate when not maintained.

services.title: Exterior Cleaning
services.description: Professional grade window cleaning. To reach our meticulous standards at EDM, for most residential properties we detail windows by hand with a squeegee and clean microfibre cloth in a safe and effective manner. Our efficiency allows for better pricing and our skill ensures guaranteed results.

services.title: Commercial Services
services.description: Specialized window cleaning services for commercial buildings, offices, and retail properties with flexible scheduling.

gutter-services.title: Gutter Services
gutter-services.subtitle: Gutter Services
gutter-services.description: Complete gutter services including cleaning, repairs, and preventive maintenance to protect your property from water damage.

services.title: Gutter Cleaning
services.description: No-mess, hand removal of leaves & debris followed by a full system flush including downspouts to ensure efficient water evacuation. Every gutter cleaning includes an overview diagnosis and pictures upon request.

services.title: Gutter Guard Installation
services.description: Properties with many overhanging trees may require further protection from falling debris. Custom fitted guard systems to help prevent build up & blockage to reduce future maintenance.

services.title: Maintenance & Repairs
services.description: Blockages, leaks & replacement of most components are all services available from us. We can design and apply the correct solution to your gutter drainage issues.
features: Detailed overview diagnosis with picture & video

pressure-washing.title: Pressure & Soft Washing
pressure-washing.subtitle: Pressure & Soft Washing Services
pressure-washing.description: Professional pressure & soft washing services to clean and restore the appearance of the various exterior surfaces of your property. We also remove vines in many cases.

services.title: Hard Surface Cleaning
services.description: Safe and professional pressure cleaning of driveways, patios, walkways & other exterior surfaces. We also offer a Polymeric Sand installation service to prevent growth of weeds over time.

services.title: Soft Surface Cleaning
services.description: Safe and professional soft-wash services for more fragile and delicate surfaces such as vinyl siding, fences, entrance doors, garage doors and more.

services.title: Moss Removal
services.description: Moss can grow in many environment, thriving in shady and damp areas but also on roof tiles and driveways. We have methods and quality products to remove and prolong the absence of further growth. We can also remove vines in many cases.

deck-refinishing.title: Deck Refinishing
deck-refinishing.subtitle: Deck Refinishing Services
deck-refinishing.description: Various service levels custom to your needs. Sanding, staining, sealing, washing & brightening. Available for both wood & composite decking.

services.title: Wash & Brighten Service
services.description: Algae, dirt and other contaminants alter the appearance of wood or composite decks. We provide a wash & brighten service to remove grime and restore your investment to a clean finish.

services.title: Surface Cleaning & Preparation
services.description: Deep cleaning & sanding to prepare the wood surfaces for product application. We are able to just clean your decking OR take the service further to apply stain/seal.

services.title: Staining & Sealing
services.description: Full restoration level application of high quality industry grade products to protect your deck from the elements and restore the appearance of the surfaces.

cta.contact: Contact us for a free quote
